channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (24 April 2015)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-04-24/#comment-6">Carlo Manf</a>.
Thanks Carlo, I definitely will be. If you'd like to get an email when it comes out just use the subscribe box above these comments. Cheers.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Carlo Manf.

Thanks Carlo, I definitely will be. If you’d like to get an email when it comes out just use the subscribe box above these comments. Cheers.

item.title: By: Carlo Manf
item.dc:creator: Carlo Manf
item.description: Hi Nick. I'd definitely be interested in reading This Week in Genesis on a regular basis if you're going to keep writing it every week.
item.content:encoded: Hi Nick. I’d definitely be interested in reading This Week in Genesis on a regular basis if you’re going to keep writing it every week.

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-04-24/#comment-4">Trisha Cupra</a>.
Hey Trisha, no problem (and good luck with it!)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Trisha Cupra.

Hey Trisha, no problem (and good luck with it!)

item.title: By: Trisha Cupra
item.dc:creator: Trisha Cupra
item.description: Thanks for the Genesis Camp shoutout!

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-04-24/#comment-2">Kristie Hill</a>.
Thanks Kristie, it was my pleasure (and loved the post!)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Kristie Hill.

Thanks Kristie, it was my pleasure (and loved the post!)

item.title: By: Kristie Hill
item.dc:creator: Kristie Hill
item.description: Thanks for mentioning my post on what makes Genesis so awesome. I'm excited for this series of yours!
item.content:encoded: Thanks for mentioning my post on what makes Genesis so awesome. I’m excited for this series of yours!
